definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be, or beocme, drunk, drunken (NH id., der. spec. and deriv.; Sir 40:18, Sir 40:20 [[שכר]] strong drink; Ar.sakira be drunken, also be full, sakara fill; As. šikaru; = [[שֵׁכָר]], šikaru, drunken, perhaps also vb. šakâru; Eth.sacra:: Aram. [[שִׁכְרָא]], 4akro0 = [[שְׁכָר]], esp. date-wine (Löw p. 125), cf. 4kar be drunken, usu. (der. spec.) defle, deform, etc.; from [[שֵׁכָר]], Egypt. &aubtà-k-av-k-ïra WMM As. u. Eur. 102, Gk. si/\kera, Lewy Fremdw, 81);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[שָֽׁכְרוּ]] Is 29:9; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּשְׁכָָּר]]Ge 9:21, 3 mpl. [[יִשְׁכָּרָוּן]] Is 49:26, etc.; Imv. mpl. [[שִׁכְרוּ]] Je 25:27 Ct So 5:1; Inf. cstr. Hag 1:6; Pt. pass. [[שְׁכֻרַת]]Is 51:21 (Ges:§ 130 b Lag:BN 60);—become drunken Ge 9:21 (J), of social drinking Ge 43:34 (J), Ct So 5:1, token of plenty Hag 1:6; fig. of nations staggering helplessly under calamity Je 25:27, Je 51:21([[וְלאׁ מִיׇּ֑יִן]]), of Na 3:11; of infatuation Is 29:9 ([[וְלאׁ יַיִן]]), of disgrace La 4:21, self-destruction, ´[[כֶּעָסִיס דָּמָם יִשׁ]]: Is 49:26.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: make drunken: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[וַיְשַׁכְּרֵהוּ]] 2Sa 11:13, lit.; fig. 1 s. (sf. of people) [[וַאֲשַׁכְּרֵם]] (read ´[[וׇ]]:) Is 63:6 (subj. ´[[י]]:) I made them drunk in my wrath (but MSS Ges Hi Ew Che Kit Marti al. [[וׇאֲשַׁבְּרֵם]] I brake them in pieces); Pt. fs., of Bab., [[מְשַׁכֶּרֶת בָּל־הָרֶץ]] Je 51:7; cf. Inf. abs. [[שַׁכֵּר]] Hb Hab 2:15 (i. e. terrorizing nations; read prob. ´[[הַשְׁקֵה וְאַף שׁ]]: We Now).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: id.: Pf.  1 s. [[וְהִשְׁכַּרְתִּ֫י]] Je 51:27 (subj. ´[[י]]:) i.e. make princes helpless, [[וְהִשְׁכַּרְתִּים]] v:Je 51:39; Imv. mpl. sf. [[הַשְׁכִּירֻהוּ]] obj. Moab, i.e. make helpless and disgraced Je 48:26; Impf. 1 s [[אַשְׁכִּיר חְצַּי מִדָּם]] De 32:42.—Ruben:JQ xi (1889), 446 prop. [[מַשְׁכִּירוֹת]] Ho 7:5 for [[משׁך ידו את]].

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 fs. [[תִּשְׁתַּכָּרִין]] 1Sa 1:14 how long wilt thou make thyself drunken [a drunken spectacle] ?
